title: Crazy Beautiful Weddings
overview: Crazy Beautiful Weddings follows Wedding Planner Lynzie Kent as she executes bespoke weddings catered to each couple's unique love story. Watch Kent and her team work tirelessly to create one-of-a-kind celebrations that capture the true spirit, personality and love story of every couple they work with. from creating mood boards to building art installations to handcrafting decor to baking cakes, they are there every step of the way!
